content: description cozy up in the sunset bomber all winter long it features a wide ribbing and warm pockets this cute jacket works up quickly with the bulky yarn so you will be adding to your wardrobe in no time this pattern is free on my blog 1 this pattern is a kit with lion brand 2 it comes with all the yarn you need + the digital pattern you can even customize your yarn colors 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-sunset-bomber-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/3bfib
